name: Detective and Mystery Book

name: Horror Book
description: Horror is a film genre that seeks to elicit fear or disgust in its audience for entertainment purposes. Horror films often explore dark subject matter and may deal with transgressive topics or themes.

name: Comic Book
description: Comics is a narrative medium used to express ideas with images, often combined with text or other visual information.

name: Action and Adventure

name: Literary Fiction
description: Literary fiction is a category of novels that emphasize style, character, and theme over plot.
